hero-title: PRODOTTI — a new generation premium store.
hero-title-2: We've combined European taste, Italian style, Thai exoticism, and the reliability of Russian brands. As an official distributor, we work directly with manufacturers – without intermediaries and with a focus on impeccable quality. We carefully select each product. Delicious. Stylish. Affordable.
footer-desc: Your trusted partner bringing European quality to Uzbekistan. Premium products, professional service, and customer satisfaction are our core principles.
O'zbekiston, Toshkent, Oloy bozori: Uzbekistan, Tashkent, Yunusobod district, Oloy Bazaar
faq-2-answer: Our premium store is located at the Alay Bazaar in Yunusabad district, Tashkent.
payment-desc: Pay with cash, bank transfer, Click, Payme, Uzcard, and other convenient methods. 100% security is guaranteed for online payments.
testimonials-1: I've tried many olives, but these olives from Italcarciofi are simply amazing! So delicate, rich in flavor, like being on vacation. Very happy with my purchase!
testimonials-2: Nesti Dante soap is my little weakness. The scent is simply magical, like stepping into an Italian garden. My skin feels soft, nourished, and not at all dry afterwards. I enjoy using it so much that I've already gifted it to my friends - now they're in love with it too!
testimonials-3: Aroy-D is the secret to my delicious dinners. I especially love their coconut milk — rich, fragrant, and perfect for curries. Their sauces are also excellent, giving dishes that authentic Asian flavor. Now I can cook even better at home than in a restaurant!
